eu.tivian.musico.database

Class AlbumCursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.CursorWrapper
      • eu.tivian.musico.database.AlbumCursor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cursor, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class AlbumCursor
extends CursorWrapper
    A database cursor focused on providing the interface for retrieving Album object from database.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private String ordering
      Denotes which ordering is currently used.
      private Function<Long,Cursor> tracks
      Function used to get the track list of the album at the current position of the cursor.

    • Field Detail

      • tracks

        private Function<Long,Cursor> tracks
        Function used to get the track list of the album at the current position of the cursor.

      • ordering

        private String ordering
        Denotes which ordering is currently used. This information is used to determine the scroll bar label text.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlbumCursor

        AlbumCursor(Cursor cursor,
            String ordering,
            Function<Long,Cursor> tracks)
        Default constructor used to wrap the supplied cursor in this object.
        Parameters:
        cursor - database cursor to be wrapped by this class.
        ordering - currently used ordering of the album list.
        tracks - functor used to get the track list.

    • Method Detail

      • getAlbum

        public Album getAlbum()
        Gets the album at the current position of the cursor.
        Returns:
        the album at the current position of the cursor. The returned album doesn't have the track list. It can be supplied later by calling the loadTracks(Album) function.

      • loadTracks

        public void loadTracks(Album album)
        Loads the track list into the album.
        Parameters:
        album - album into which the track list will be loaded.

      • getLabel

        public String getLabel()
        Gets the label according to the supplied ordering.
        Returns:
        the scroll bar label text.
